rukus.text: 23|93|Bigu: «Parvardigoro, agar on [azoʙe]-ro, ki ʙa onon va'da doda mesavad, ʙa man nison medihi [ki sohidas ʙosam]
23|94|pas, Parvardigoro maro dar [hangomi azoʙ dar kanori in] guruhi sitamgor qaror madeh»
23|95|Va hatman, Mo tavonoem, ki on ciro ʙa onon va'da medihem, ʙa tu nison dihem
23|96|[Ej pajomʙar] ʙadiro ʙa sevae, ki ʙehtar ast, daf' kun [va ʙuʙaxsu sikeʙo ʙos]. Mo ʙa on ci [musrikon dar ʙorai tu] tavsif mekunand, donotarem
23|97|Va ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, man az vasvasahoi sajotin ʙa Tu panoh meʙaram
23|98|Va Parvardigoro, az in ki onho nazdi man hozir savand, [niz] ʙa Tu panoh meʙaram»

23|99|[Kofiron pajvasta ʙar aqidai ʙotilason hastand] To hangome ki margi jake az onon faro rasad, [on goh dar hole ki] nazdi Parvardigori [xud nolavu zori mekunad, ʙa faristagon] megujad: «Maro [ʙa dunjo] ʙozgardoned

23|100|Sojad dar on ci [kutohi namuda va] tark kardam, kori soistae ancom diham». Hargiz cunin nest. Be tardid, in faqat suxane ast, ki u ʙa zaʙon megujad [va hargiz raftoras taƣjir namekunad] va ruze, ki ʙarangexta savand, pusti sarason ʙarzaxest
23|101|Ruze, ki dar sur damida mesavad, hec jak az [ iftixoroti xonavodagi va] pajvandhoi xesovandi mijonason [ʙarqaror] naxohad ʙud va [az vahsati azoʙ] az [holi] jakdigar namepursand
23|102|Va har ki vaznai a'molas sangin ʙosad, ononand, ki rastagorand
23|103|Va har ki vaznai a'molas saʙuk ʙosad, ononand, ki ʙa xes zijon zadaand va dar duzax covidonand
23|104|Otas cehrahojasonro mesuzonad va dar on co rujturs va zistmanzarand
23|105|[Ba onon gufta mesavad] «Magar na in ʙud, ki ojotam ʙar sumo xonda mesud va onhoro duruƣ meangosted?»
23|106|[Dar posux] Megujand: «Parvardigoro, ʙadʙaxti ʙar mo cira sud va guruhe gumroh ʙudem
23|107|Parvardigoro, moro az in [duzax] ʙerun ovar. Pas, agar [ʙa kufru nofarmoni] ʙozgastem, hatman, sitamgorem»
23|108|[Alloh taolo] Mefarmojad: «Dar on [otas] gum saved va ʙo Man suxan nagued
23|109|Guruhe az ʙandagonam meguftand: «Parvardigoro, imon ovardem, pas, moro ʙiʙaxso va ʙar mo rahm kun, [ki] ʙe tardid, Tu ʙehtarin ʙaxsojandai»
23|110|Vale sumo ononro masxara mekarded, to coje, ki [sargarm sudan ʙa tamasxuri eson] zikr [-u iʙodati] Maro az jodaton ʙurd va hamcunon ʙa onon mexandided
23|111|Imruz Man ononro az on cihate, ki sikeʙoi kardand, podos mediham. Ore, esonand, ki rastagorand»
23|112|[Alloh taolo ʙa duzaxijon] Megujad: «Cand sol dar zamin ʙa sar ʙurded»
23|113|Megujand: «Jak ruz jo ʙaxse az jak ruzro ʙa sar ʙurdem. Az hisoʙgaron [ki hisoʙi ruzu solro nigah medorand] ʙipurs»
23|114|U megujad: «[Ore] Agar medonisted, cuz andake [dar dunjo] ʙa sar naʙurded
23|115|Ojo pindostaed, ki sumoro ʙehuda ofaridaem va ʙa suji Mo ʙozgardonida namesaved
23|116|Pas, ʙalandmartaʙa [va ʙuzurg] ast Alloh taolo [ki] farmonravoi haq ast. Hec ma'ʙude [ʙa haq] cuz U nest [va] Parvardigori Arsi garonqadr ast
23|117|Va har ki ʙo Alloh taolo ma'ʙudi digarero ʙixonad, jaqinan, hec dalele ʙar [haqqonijati] on naxohad dost va hisoʙi u ʙo Parvardigoras xohad ʙud. Be tardid, kofiron rastagor namesavand
23|118|Va [ej Pajomʙar] ʙigu: «Parvardigoro, [gunohonamro] ʙiʙaxsoj va rahm kun va Tu ʙehtarin ʙaxsandai»
